title: Variety pack PLUS
content: I love a good variety pack! Like many know, your period can tend to be a bit unpredictable. You think you'll have an easy month and then nope. Well this pack actually packs all the sizes and protection that you need. I love knowing that whatever this month tends to bring on that I'll be prepared with Tampax. The sizes are great to decide what I'll need for that day and I know I wont have to worry.
